channel.title: [508] How do add more rock (ore) spawns?
channel.description:
Can't find it anywhere. Trying to add more ores to a certain area. Please help.
Also, if someone could tell me the id for mithril, adamantite and runite ores I'd appreciate it, thanks.
Does editing threads bump them? :/
